overview: Mwaaba Alec Mugala is a 19yr old Zambian Web designer who founded the Moonlyt. He originally started working on it in 2006 when he was only 13yrs old,The main idea was for Moonlyt to become a Video game company,the idea faded & it was transformed into a Social network which is on the rise. He is a web designer who currently studies computer science at the copperbelt university in Zambia
